events.message: Customer reported a car accident that occurred on March 30th, involving a collision with another vehicle at an intersection.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident due to the involvement of a personal vehicle collision.
An insurance agent was assigned promptly to handle the liability and damage assessment for the automobile involved.
The customer was contacted to acknowledge receipt of the auto accident claim and was informed about the next steps.
Request sent for the police accident report, driver's license, and photos of the vehicle damage to proceed with investigation.
Customer uploaded all required documents including the police report, photos, and repair estimates as requested.
The investigation team began reviewing the circumstances of the auto accident and assessing liability and damage.
The investigation concluded with confirmation that the customer was not at fault and the vehicle damages are covered.
A settlement offer was proposed covering repair costs and compensation for the inconvenience caused by the accident.
Customer provided positive feedback appreciating the timely communication and fair settlement proposal.
The claim was formally approved after customer's acceptance of the settlement offer and agreement terms.
Payment for the approved settlement was issued to the customerâ€™s bank account as per the agreement.
The auto accident claim has been successfully closed following full settlement and customer confirmation.
All documentation and records related to the closed auto accident claim have been archived for future reference.
